title: Strawberry Banana Smoothie
full_text:
Strawberry Banana Smoothie
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Serves
2
to 3
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
1 1/2
cups
frozen strawberries
(
10
ounces
;
290
g
)
1 1/2
cups
(
355
ml
)
whole milk
(see note)
1
ripe
banana
1
tablespoon
strawberry jam
(
1
ounce
;
25
g
)
Directions
Combine frozen strawberries, milk, banana, and strawberry jam in a blender. Pulse a few times to break up the fruit, then blend on high speed until completely smooth, about 1 minute.
Serious Eats / Amanda Suarez
Special Equipment
Blender
Notes
Feel free to substitute with dairy-free milk if desired.
